Package net.joala.expression

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Expression<T>
    An expression is handed over to conditions to be evaluated again and again.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractExpression<T>
    Convenience abstract implementation of Expression which can get a simple description via constructor.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ExpressionEvaluationException
    This exception is thrown by Expression.get() when the expression cannot (yet) be computed and contains a root cause.
